metadata.description: Most essential Spanish verbs - fundamental for basic communication

present.spanish: Hablo español con mis compañeros de trabajo.
present.english: I speak Spanish with my coworkers.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Hablas muy bien inglés para ser principiante.
present.english: You speak English very well for a beginner.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Hablás como un verdadero porteño.
present.english: You speak like a true Buenos Aires native.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Habla por teléfono con su madre todos los días.
present.english: He/She talks on the phone with his/her mother every day.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Hablamos de nuestros planes para el futuro.
present.english: We talk about our plans for the future.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Habláis demasiado rápido para los estudiantes.
present.english: You all speak too fast for the students.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Hablan en voz baja durante la película.
present.english: They speak in low voices during the movie.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Hablé con el director sobre mi proyecto.
preterite.english: I spoke with the director about my project.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Hablaste muy bien en la presentación.
preterite.english: You spoke very well in the presentation.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Hablaste con mucha pasión sobre el tema.
preterite.english: You spoke with great passion about the topic.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Habló durante dos horas en la conferencia.
preterite.english: He/She spoke for two hours at the conference.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Hablamos toda la noche sobre nuestros sueños.
preterite.english: We talked all night about our dreams.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Hablasteis con el embajador en la recepción.
preterite.english: You all spoke with the ambassador at the reception.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Hablaron en tres idiomas durante la reunión.
preterite.english: They spoke in three languages during the meeting.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Hablaré en la conferencia internacional mañana.
future.english: I will speak at the international conference tomorrow.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Hablarás con fluidez después de practicar más.
future.english: You will speak fluently after practicing more.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Hablarás como un nativo después del intercambio.
future.english: You will speak like a native after the exchange.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Hablará en nombre de toda la organización.
future.english: He/She will speak on behalf of the entire organization.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Hablaremos con el cliente la próxima semana.
future.english: We will speak with the client next week.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Hablaréis en la radio sobre vuestro proyecto.
future.english: You all will speak on the radio about your project.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Hablarán en la televisión nacional mañana.
future.english: They will speak on national television tomorrow.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Como frutas y verduras todos los días.
present.english: I eat fruits and vegetables every day.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Comes muy saludable desde que empezaste la dieta.
present.english: You eat very healthy since you started the diet.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Comés las mejores milanesas de la ciudad.
present.english: You eat the best milanesas in the city.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Come en el restaurante italiano cada viernes.
present.english: He/She eats at the Italian restaurant every Friday.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Comemos juntos en familia los domingos.
present.english: We eat together as a family on Sundays.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Coméis tapas en el bar de la esquina.
present.english: You all eat tapas at the corner bar.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Comen pizza los viernes por la noche.
present.english: They eat pizza on Friday nights.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Comí paella por primera vez en Valencia.
preterite.english: I ate paella for the first time in Valencia.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Comiste demasiado en la cena de ayer.
preterite.english: You ate too much at yesterday's dinner.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Comiste un asado increíble en lo de tu tío.
preterite.english: You ate an incredible barbecue at your uncle's place.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Comió sushi por primera vez anoche.
preterite.english: He/She ate sushi for the first time last night.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Comimos en el mejor restaurante de la ciudad.
preterite.english: We ate at the best restaurant in the city.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Comisteis jamón ibérico auténtico en Sevilla.
preterite.english: You all ate authentic Iberian ham in Seville.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Comieron mariscos frescos en la costa.
preterite.english: They ate fresh seafood on the coast.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Comeré más verduras para mejorar mi salud.
future.english: I will eat more vegetables to improve my health.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Comerás platos exóticos en tu viaje a Asia.
future.english: You will eat exotic dishes on your trip to Asia.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Comerás empanadas caseras en casa de la abuela.
future.english: You will eat homemade empanadas at grandma's house.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Comerá en los mejores restaurantes de París.
future.english: He/She will eat at the best restaurants in Paris.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Comeremos paella auténtica en España.
future.english: We will eat authentic paella in Spain.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Comeréis cocido madrileño en el restaurante tradicional.
future.english: You all will eat Madrid-style chickpea stew at the traditional restaurant.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Comerán comida orgánica en el nuevo restaurante.
future.english: They will eat organic food at the new restaurant.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Vivo en el centro de la ciudad desde hace años.
present.english: I live in the city center for years now.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Vives cerca del parque y es muy conveniente.
present.english: You live near the park and it's very convenient.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Vivís en el barrio más lindo de Buenos Aires.
present.english: You live in the most beautiful neighborhood in Buenos Aires.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Vive con sus padres para ahorrar dinero.
present.english: He/She lives with his/her parents to save money.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Vivimos en una casa grande con jardín.
present.english: We live in a big house with a garden.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Vivís en el mismo barrio desde la infancia.
present.english: You all live in the same neighborhood since childhood.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Viven en el mismo edificio que nosotros.
present.english: They live in the same building as us.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Viví en París durante mis estudios universitarios.
preterite.english: I lived in Paris during my university studies.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Viviste una experiencia increíble en Japón.
preterite.english: You lived an incredible experience in Japan.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Viviste momentos muy difíciles el año pasado.
preterite.english: You lived through very difficult moments last year.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Vivió en tres países diferentes antes de los treinta.
preterite.english: He/She lived in three different countries before thirty.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Vivimos la mejor época de nuestras vidas.
preterite.english: We lived the best time of our lives.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Vivisteis aventuras extraordinarias en Sudamérica.
preterite.english: You all lived extraordinary adventures in South America.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Vivieron la guerra civil en primera persona.
preterite.english: They lived through the civil war firsthand.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Viviré en España cuando termine la carrera.
future.english: I will live in Spain when I finish my degree.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Vivirás experiencias únicas en tu nuevo trabajo.
future.english: You will live unique experiences in your new job.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Vivirás como un rey con ese nuevo salario.
future.english: You will live like a king with that new salary.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Vivirá en una casa frente al mar.
future.english: He/She will live in a house facing the sea.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Viviremos juntos después de la boda.
future.english: We will live together after the wedding.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Viviréis momentos inolvidables en vuestro viaje.
future.english: You all will live unforgettable moments on your trip.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Vivirán en el extranjero por motivos de trabajo.
future.english: They will live abroad for work reasons.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Voy al trabajo en metro todas las mañanas.
present.english: I go to work by subway every morning.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Vas a la universidad en bicicleta.
present.english: You go to university by bicycle.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Vas al gimnasio después del trabajo.
present.english: You go to the gym after work.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Va a la oficina muy temprano cada día.
present.english: He/She goes to the office very early every day.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Vamos de compras los fines de semana.
present.english: We go shopping on weekends.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Vais al cine todos los viernes por la noche.
present.english: You all go to the movies every Friday night.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Van al parque con los niños cada tarde.
present.english: They go to the park with the children every afternoon.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Fui a París el año pasado por trabajo.
preterite.english: I went to Paris last year for work.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Fuiste al concierto de rock anoche.
preterite.english: You went to the rock concert last night.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Fuiste a la fiesta de cumpleaños de María.
preterite.english: You went to María's birthday party.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Fue al médico por el dolor de espalda.
preterite.english: He/She went to the doctor for back pain.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Fuimos a la playa durante las vacaciones.
preterite.english: We went to the beach during vacation.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Fuisteis al museo de arte moderno ayer.
preterite.english: You all went to the modern art museum yesterday.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Fueron al restaurante nuevo del centro.
preterite.english: They went to the new restaurant downtown.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Iré a estudiar a Alemania el próximo año.
future.english: I will go to study in Germany next year.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Irás a la entrevista de trabajo mañana.
future.english: You will go to the job interview tomorrow.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Irás a conocer lugares increíbles en tu viaje.
future.english: You will go see incredible places on your trip.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Irá a la conferencia internacional en mayo.
future.english: He/She will go to the international conference in May.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Iremos a visitar a los abuelos este domingo.
future.english: We will go visit the grandparents this Sunday.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Iréis a la boda de vuestro primo en junio.
future.english: You all will go to your cousin's wedding in June.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Irán a inaugurar la nueva sucursal mañana.
future.english: They will go inaugurate the new branch tomorrow.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Puedo ayudarte con el proyecto si quieres.
present.english: I can help you with the project if you want.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Puedes hacerlo mejor si te concentras más.
present.english: You can do it better if you concentrate more.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Podés venir a casa cuando quieras.
present.english: You can come home whenever you want.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Puede hablar tres idiomas con fluidez.
present.english: He/She can speak three languages fluently.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Podemos terminar el trabajo antes del viernes.
present.english: We can finish the work before Friday.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Podéis venir a la fiesta si queréis.
present.english: You all can come to the party if you want.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Pueden resolver el problema sin ayuda externa.
present.english: They can solve the problem without external help.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Pude terminar el informe antes de la fecha límite.
preterite.english: I was able to finish the report before the deadline.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Pudiste convencer a todos con tu presentación.
preterite.english: You were able to convince everyone with your presentation.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Pudiste resolver el conflicto con tu hermano.
preterite.english: You were able to resolve the conflict with your brother.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Pudo escapar del edificio antes del incendio.
preterite.english: He/She was able to escape from the building before the fire.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Pudimos comprar la casa de nuestros sueños.
preterite.english: We were able to buy our dream house.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Pudisteis ganar el campeonato después de tanto esfuerzo.
preterite.english: You all were able to win the championship after so much effort.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Pudieron salvar el negocio familiar.
preterite.english: They were able to save the family business.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Podré viajar por el mundo cuando me jubile.
future.english: I will be able to travel the world when I retire.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Podrás estudiar en la universidad que elijas.
future.english: You will be able to study at the university you choose.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Podrás comprarte el auto que tanto querés.
future.english: You will be able to buy the car you want so much.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Podrá trabajar desde casa tres días a la semana.
future.english: He/She will be able to work from home three days a week.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Podremos mudarnos a una casa más grande.
future.english: We will be able to move to a bigger house.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Podréis visitar a vuestros abuelos en el pueblo.
future.english: You all will be able to visit your grandparents in the village.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Podrán expandir el negocio a otros países.
future.english: They will be able to expand the business to other countries.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Quiero aprender francés el próximo año.
present.english: I want to learn French next year.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Quieres viajar a Europa este verano.
present.english: You want to travel to Europe this summer.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Querés comprar una casa en las afueras.
present.english: You want to buy a house in the suburbs.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Quiere estudiar medicina en la universidad.
present.english: He/She wants to study medicine at university.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Queremos comprar un coche nuevo este año.
present.english: We want to buy a new car this year.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Queréis ir al concierto de rock mañana.
present.english: You all want to go to the rock concert tomorrow.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Quieren mudarse a una ciudad más pequeña.
present.english: They want to move to a smaller city.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Quise llamarte pero se me olvidó.
preterite.english: I wanted to call you but I forgot.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Quisiste ayudar pero ya era demasiado tarde.
preterite.english: You wanted to help but it was already too late.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Quisiste decirle la verdad pero no te animaste.
preterite.english: You wanted to tell him/her the truth but you didn't dare.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Quiso renunciar pero cambió de opinión.
preterite.english: He/She wanted to resign but changed his/her mind.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Quisimos ir al concierto pero se agotaron las entradas.
preterite.english: We wanted to go to the concert but the tickets sold out.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Quisisteis venir a la boda pero teníais otros planes.
preterite.english: You all wanted to come to the wedding but you had other plans.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Quisieron comprar la casa pero el precio era muy alto.
preterite.english: They wanted to buy the house but the price was too high.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Querré tomarme unas vacaciones largas.
future.english: I will want to take a long vacation.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Querrás cambiar de trabajo después de graduarte.
future.english: You will want to change jobs after you graduate.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Querrás volver a tu país después de tanto tiempo.
future.english: You will want to return to your country after so long.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Querrá jubilarse antes de los sesenta años.
future.english: He/She will want to retire before sixty years old.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Querremos tener más tiempo para la familia.
future.english: We will want to have more time for family.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Querréis mudaros cerca del mar cuando os jubiléis.
future.english: You all will want to move near the sea when you retire.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Querrán expandir su negocio a nivel internacional.
future.english: They will want to expand their business internationally.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Tengo una reunión importante esta tarde.
present.english: I have an important meeting this afternoon.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Tienes mucho talento para la música.
present.english: You have a lot of talent for music.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Tenés una sonrisa muy linda.
present.english: You have a very beautiful smile.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Tiene tres hijos pequeños en casa.
present.english: He/She has three small children at home.
present.subject: él/ella/usted

present.spanish: Tenemos muchos planes para el fin de semana.
present.english: We have many plans for the weekend.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Tenéis una casa preciosa en el campo.
present.english: You all have a beautiful house in the countryside.
present.subject: vosotros

present.spanish: Tienen experiencia en marketing digital.
present.english: They have experience in digital marketing.
present.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Tuve una reunión importante esta mañana.
preterite.english: I had an important meeting this morning.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Tuviste mucha paciencia con los niños.
preterite.english: You had a lot of patience with the children.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Tuviste suerte de encontrar trabajo tan rápido.
preterite.english: You were lucky to find work so quickly.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Tuvo que cancelar el viaje por la lluvia.
preterite.english: He/She had to cancel the trip because of the rain.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Tuvimos una conversación muy interesante.
preterite.english: We had a very interesting conversation.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Tuvisteis problemas con el coche ayer.
preterite.english: You all had problems with the car yesterday.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Tuvieron que esperar dos horas en el aeropuerto.
preterite.english: They had to wait two hours at the airport.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Tendré más tiempo libre el próximo mes.
future.english: I will have more free time next month.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Tendrás la oportunidad de viajar a Europa.
future.english: You will have the opportunity to travel to Europe.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Tendrás que estudiar mucho para el examen.
future.english: You will have to study a lot for the exam.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Tendrá una entrevista de trabajo mañana.
future.english: He/She will have a job interview tomorrow.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Tendremos una fiesta de cumpleaños el sábado.
future.english: We will have a birthday party on Saturday.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Tendréis que decidir pronto sobre el proyecto.
future.english: You all will have to decide soon about the project.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Tendrán acceso a todos los documentos necesarios.
future.english: They will have access to all the necessary documents.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

present.spanish: Soy profesora de matemáticas en la universidad.
present.english: I am a mathematics professor at the university.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Eres muy inteligente para tu edad.
present.english: You are very intelligent for your age.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Sos el mejor amigo que tengo.
present.english: You are the best friend I have.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Es médico en el hospital central.
present.english: He/She is a doctor at the central hospital.

present.spanish: Somos estudiantes de intercambio.
present.english: We are exchange students.

present.spanish: Sois los mejores de la clase.
present.english: You all are the best in the class.

present.spanish: Son mis vecinos desde hace años.
present.english: They have been my neighbors for years.

preterite.spanish: Fui presidente del club estudiantil.
preterite.english: I was president of the student club.

preterite.spanish: Fuiste muy valiente durante la emergencia.
preterite.english: You were very brave during the emergency.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Fuiste el primero en llegar a la fiesta.
preterite.english: You were the first to arrive at the party.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Fue mi profesor favorito en el colegio.
preterite.english: He was my favorite teacher in school.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Fuimos compañeros de cuarto en la universidad.
preterite.english: We were roommates in college.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Fuisteis los ganadores del torneo.
preterite.english: You all were the winners of the tournament.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Fueron los primeros en llegar al evento.
preterite.english: They were the first to arrive at the event.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Seré doctora cuando termine la carrera.
future.english: I will be a doctor when I finish my degree.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Serás un gran artista algún día.
future.english: You will be a great artist someday.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Serás famoso con esa voz tan linda.
future.english: You will be famous with that beautiful voice.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Será la nueva directora del departamento.
future.english: She will be the new department director.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Seremos socios en el nuevo negocio.
future.english: We will be partners in the new business.

future.spanish: Seréis los próximos en presentar.

future.spanish: Serán los nuevos propietarios del edificio.
